eksath jathinge pragnyapthiyehi, dewana parichchedayehi, 4 waganthiya anuwa:[3] mul samajikayansanskaranaya owun athuluwu dinaya anuwa wathman eja samajika rajyayange sithiyama. 1945 (mul samajikayan) samajikayan-nowana nirikshaka rajyayan wadi wisthara: eksath jathinge ithihasaya eksath jathinge aarakshaka mandalayehi sthira samajikayan pas dena ( china samuhanduwa, pranshaya, esosasa, eksath rajadhaniya, saha eksath janapada) saha anekuth athsankaruwangen bahutharayaka wisin eksath jathinge pragnyapthiya aparanumatha kirimen anathuruwa, 1945 okthobar 24 dinadi eja nilawashayen bihiwuni.[4]

palaweni uththaraya thamayi
hama kenatama subha aluth awuruddak wewa.
ee aya langata yannata labunoth depa wandana karanawa.
nuduru anagathayedi mama ee langa kotasa pala karanna balaporoththu wenawa.
(prashnaya kiyanna bari wena mokakwath nisa nemeyi, eeka katak arala kothanakawath reddak andagena nam kiyanna puluwan ekak nowana nisa.)
'umbaa thaniwela naha law puso...!'
thamuse ma gana dannawane.
nalin da silwa samaga apa eka ekanga wana than dekak thibe.
pora oya wage ekak maga harina manussayek nemeyine
emenma eya manik katuwa pradeshayen aarambha wi rawi mandalayata wihidi giye nam noyekuth kala shilpawalin prasiddha wana ayeku handuna gatha hakiya.
para thote hamu wu kihipadenekugen wimasuwada thama sohoyuriyawa dutu bawak owuhu pawasuwe natha.
oyath dan blogawakashe athyawashya samajikawak wela iwarayi
mage lipiye sirasthalaya hatiyata eya yoda gaththe, eyin sinhalaye wathman nambauruwak pilibimbau karena nisaya.
amathi putha ekka baladdi ape eka raththaran.
passeyi mata therune mokakda me kiwwe kiyala.

mema karunu salakillata ganimin kadinal himiyanta erehiwa pulul wimarshanaya sidukara shri lankawe samangiya ha sanhindiyawa wenuwen pap wahanse kriyakaranu athayi balaporeththu wana bawa adala lipiye sandahanwa atha.
ithin mathara kridanganaya sanathge namin nam wune ohuta garu kirimak washayen.
mehi roga lakshana lesa handinwenne, una, hisaradaya, handipath ha mansha peshiwala wedanawa, ugura wanawima, kayika dubalathawayi.
ammapa pin sidda wenawa api wage hudi janayata therena widihata mewwa liyanawata.
issara ehema kiwwe ape amma, thaththa, aachchi.
hariyata wada karanne nathnam,
ethanadi watawuna aya "kunu harupa bhashawen " baninawa apita ahenawa.
ema nisama sinamawa menma anikuth wishayan harahada godanagena nawa thathwayan handuna ganimata apa bhawithakarana minum dadu ha yedumda eeta anurupawa galapenawa da yanna gatalu sahagathayi.
meka anathurudayaka wenne anathurudayak selfi ganna giyama.
mamayi ape thawa yaluwo kipadenekuyi pata andum andagena wada kale..
owun aluth lakunak yatathe wenath sandhanayakin tharaga kala yuthuyi.
thibena aarthikaye sanwardhana gamana adala karawana athireka awayawa iwath kirimayi karanu labanne.
mama paminili satahana balanna illuwama dunna.
paminilikaru danwa aththe namal rajapaksha mahatha parlimenthu manthriwarayakuwa sitiyadi wiwidha giwisumwalin ayatha lesa mudal upaya athi bawayi.
mema sisuwiya pereda adhyapanika katayuthu nimakara ema adhyapana aayathanaya asala randi sita aththe niwasin ayawa ragena yamata ena wahanaya paminena thuruya.
widuli balayath ehemayi.
eeth eya mawa wadiya ganan gaththe na.

shri lankawe rajya kala 37 wana raju, wasabha (wahap) bu. wa. 608 sita warsha 44 k rajakala bawath, apa rate wari karmanthaya nanwalimeth, wehera wiharadiya thanimedith, pramukhathwayak gath bawa api asa aththemu.
gamperaliya yatathe ape wawtika hadanna patangaththa.
thiyena fit ekatane umbaa owwa kiyanne….
ee harunahama melo kalpanawak ee olugedi thula thiyenawa da kiyala danne naha.

ee nisama dan aththe naruma deshapalakayange thakkadi katha pilibada nirwachana ho buddhi ansha thorathuru wishleshanayata ostharla wimata dagalima nowa, yalith ewan winashayak walakwa ganimata ‘samaja wagakimen’ katayuthu kirimath, ratak lesa awama washayen sanwedithwayen jiwitha walin wandi gewannata sidu wu apema aadaraniyange pawulwalata awashya mano – samajiya sahaya labadima misa, thawath jiwitha walata daruwan, demapiyan, nada hithawathun ahimi kirimata hethuwen wairi prakasha sidukaramin samajaya thawaduratath wyakula thaththwayakata ada damimata awashya ‘pasa’ poshanaya kirima nowa siyallan samanga sahodarathwaya saha aadaraya beda ganimayi.
madhyawalata samajayaka pera gamankaruwa wiya hakiyi.
shriyantha mata kiwwa “oyawa dakkama hari baya hithenawane” kiyalath.
tikak hithala balanta.
mita nawasilanthayedi labadena sathi dekaka puhunuwakuth athulath.
owun siyalu denama sitiye tharangayakaya.
ehi nyaya katholika chinthanayehi men ma thrikotika wiya.
kisidu pakshayakin niyojithayaku nomathiwima nisa asaranawana janathawak sitina pradesha pawathina bawa prakashakalada danata pawathina nithiya anuwa ewani pradesha natha.
nagenahira muhudu werala thiraya dige yamuda awidagena........
aarachchila pattama ayin kara gramasewaka niladharinta path wim bhara di owunata bala thala labadime wada piliwelakata rata pariwarthanaya wannata wiya. .
ekala lingikathwaya jiwithayama nowa jiwithaye ek angayak wiya.
in samaharak lapati gedi nowuyen aawesa wi siti kapu mahathata aawegaya gena dunne ya.
aapu paththatama giya.

mema prathishakthikarana jathika wada satahana pilibandawa wishwasayak thaba daruwanta garbhani mawuwarunta nirdeshitha ennath nisi wayasedi labadima sama denekugema wagakimaki.yamkisi hethuwak nisa ennath laba noganna pudgalayan ha lamayin ema roga thaththwayanta goduru wanawa pamanak nowa rogi wana daruwan ha pudgalayan samajaye anekuth pudgalayanta roga karaka wisabija bedaharina roga thataka bawata pathwimaya.mewani aya samajayata saukhya prawardhanayata tharjanayaki.
hari lassana arakku walata karana hari lassana pranamayak
eheth niwaradi kalayata sama honda deyakma labewi.
rangana shilpini anusha damayanthi menewiya “laksha 20kata wadi muslim janathawa dan sinhalayanta mathak karadim rasak kara thibenawa.
ese wethath 2014 awasana bhagayedi mahindata lanudi rata bera gaththeda meki thakkadi wisinma bawa da nosalaka hariya nohaka.)

eeth lowa paranima dagabak lesa handunwana girihadu sayata owunta hani karannata awasthawak labi naha.girihadu saya winasha kirimata koti thrasthawadin pamini mohothe ee pirisata kihipa warakma darunu bambaara ha debaru prahara ella wi thibena bawa da pradeshawasihu pawasanawa.kese ho pasuwa me lowa paranima chaithyaya aaraksha karagena aththe yuda ha nawika hamudawala dakshathawa nisayi.pasuwa 2009 mayi 19 wanida yuda wijayagrahanaya labimen pasuwa aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha, buddha shasana niyojya amathya em. ke. di. es. gunawardhana, niyojya amathi susantha punchi nilame yana mahathwaru athulu pirisa ekwi me girihadu saya yalith ape bauddha janathawage wandanawata sudusu pahasukam sahitha sthanayak bawata path kirimata katayuthu kala.ee anuwa girihadu saya pudabima ada katath suwa se wandana karannata haki puja bhumiyak bawata pathwi thibenawa.

pasugiya da digatha ha awata pa්radeshawala sidu wu awasanawantha bhishana ki්raya sambandhayen parlimenthume di pa්rakashayak karamin lakshman kirialla amathyawaraya pa්rakashayak karamin kiya sitiye ee siddhin pilibanda bauddha janathawa muslim janayagen samawa gatha yuthu bawayi.
samanya wyawaharaye kuddati kiyanne me gatithiwalata.

me nadu nimiththa mathuwenne rata thula mathuwu wisheshitha samaja deshapalana arbudayak maththehiya. 2014 wasara wana wita rata palanaya kala rajapaksha rejimaya rata militarimaya eekadhipathithwayak wetha dakkagena yamin thibina.
